entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kamouraska
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:33 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
